entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
